correlations.description: Spoofing via unauthenticated APIs is a common vulnerability in cloud-native applications, including other Kubernetes-based platforms like Kubernetes Dashboard or Helm charts.
recommended_actions: Standardize API authentication across all microservices using OAuth2/JWT
Conduct cross-system API security audits

correlations.description: TLS encryption for internal/external communication aligns with industry standards for securing microservices architectures.
recommended_actions: Implement TLS 1.3 across all inter-service communication channels
Enforce certificate pinning for internal Kubernetes API traffic

correlations.description: Kubernetes DoS attacks (resource exhaustion) share attack vectors with containerized workloads in Docker Swarm or other orchestration tools.
recommended_actions: Deploy unified resource quotas across all container orchestration platforms
Implement anomaly detection for sudden resource spikes

correlations.description: Database tampering risks align with GDPR Article 30 requirements for data integrity controls.
recommended_actions: Implement audit logging for all database modifications
Conduct regular data integrity validation checks

correlations.description: Container registry vulnerabilities are common across all DevOps pipelines, including CI/CD systems and artifact repositories.
recommended_actions: Adopt signed image verification across all container registries
Integrate vulnerability scanning into CI/CD pipelines

correlations.description: Role-based access control (RBAC) mitigates elevation of privilege risks across all cloud platforms.
recommended_actions: Standardize RBAC policies across Kubernetes, Docker Swarm, and VM environments
Implement least-privilege access for container registries

correlations.description: Information disclosure risks through insecure communication overlap with vulnerabilities in API gateways and service meshes.
recommended_actions: Deploy service mesh encryption for all service-to-service communication
Enable mTLS for internal API gateways

correlations.description: Denial of Service risks align with NIST SP 800-53 Rev. 4 controls for availability protection.
recommended_actions: Implement automated cluster health monitoring
Configure auto-scaling for critical workloads

correlations.description: Database tampering risks are similar to vulnerabilities in relational database management systems (RDBMS) used across enterprise applications.
recommended_actions: Implement database activity monitoring (DAM)
Enforce field-level encryption for sensitive data

correlations.description: Container image scanning aligns with DevSecOps practices for securing all containerized workloads.
recommended_actions: Centralize container image vulnerability scanning
Enforce policy-based image approval workflows

correlations.description: Spoofing attacks via APIs share similarities with vulnerabilities in RESTful APIs used in SaaS platforms.
recommended_actions: Implement API rate limiting across all endpoints
Deploy WAF rules for API request validation

correlations.description: Information disclosure risks align with ISO 27001 requirements for data protection.
recommended_actions: Conduct regular security awareness training
Implement data classification policies

correlations.description: Elevation of privilege risks via container registries are common in all containerized environments.
recommended_actions: Enforce registry access controls
Implement image signing for all production deployments

correlations.description: Kubernetes resource limits align with cloud provider security best practices for container orchestration.
recommended_actions: Standardize resource quotas across cloud providers
Monitor for unexpected resource consumption patterns

correlations.description: Denial of Service attacks on Kubernetes clusters share vectors with DDoS attacks on cloud infrastructure.
recommended_actions: Deploy DDoS protection for cloud infrastructure
Implement network segmentation for critical workloads
